Cell.Data: Precision Rifle: Precision weapons are more accurate than rifles and do slightly more damage, making them useful at long range. Their mitigation also gives them a damage bonus against armoured (i.e. robotic) enemies. However, each shot has a higher TU cost than a rifle and the burst fire has low suppression. It also receives no short-range accuracy bonus and has a negative modifier for reaction fire, making it a poor assault weapon. Range: 30 Damage: 35 Kinetic Suppression: 25 Single / 44 Burst Mitigation: 10 Ammo Capacity: 12 shots Reaction Modifier: 0.5x Reload Cost: 30 TU Fire Modes: - 38%% TU 60 Acc x 1 shot - 49%% TU 105 Acc x 1 shot - 65%% TU 165 Acc x 1 shot - 80%% TU 75 Acc x 3 shots

Precision Laser: Precision weapons are more accurate than rifles and do slightly more damage, making them useful at long range. Their mitigation also gives them a damage bonus against armoured (i.e. robotic) enemies. However, each shot has a higher TU cost than a rifle and the burst fire has low suppression. It also receives no short-range accuracy bonus and has a negative modifier for reaction fire, making it a poor assault weapon. Range: 30 Damage: 55 Energy Suppression: 29 Single / 51 Burst Mitigation: 15 Ammo Capacity: 9 shots Reaction Modifier: 0.5x Reload Cost: 30 TU Fire Modes: - 38%% TU 60 Acc x 1 shot - 49%% TU 105 Acc x 1 shot - 65%% TU 165 Acc x 1 shot - 80%% TU 75 Acc x 3 shots
